title: Hatchet - Gary Paulsen
description:
Includes the book Hatchet by Gary Paulsen in 4 formats: EPUB, MOBI, PDF and RTF.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------



Brian Robeson, sole passenger on a Cessna 406, is on his way to visit his father when the tiny bush plane crashes in the Canadian wilderness. With nothing but his clothing, a tattered windbreaker, and the hatchet his mother had given him as a present, Brian finds himself completely alone.

Challenged by his fear and despair, and plagued with the weight of a dreadful secret he's been keeping since his parent's divorce, brian must tame his inner demons in order to survive. It will take all his know-how and determination, and more courage than he knew he possessed.
